entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. High 19.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. Local amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 19. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
